CONTENTS . VOLUMpi 1. Department of Trade and Commerce. a. Bureau of Banking, Report, 1929. . b. Building and Loan Associations, Report, 1929. (In Bureau ot Banking Report) . ■ c. Bureau of Insurance, Annual Reports, 1929, 1930. 2. Banking Investigation, Final Report, 1930. 3. Department of Public Works, Biennial Report, 1929-1930. 4. Department of Public Welfare, Biennial Report, 1928-1930. 5. Public Library Commission, Biennial Report, 1929-1930.
REPORT OF THE DEPARTMENT OF TRADE AND COMMERCE NEBRASKA 1929 Showing the Condition of the Commercial and Savings Banks, Trust Companies and Building and Loan Associations June 29, 1929
JENSEN PTG. & PUB. CO. Lincoln, Nebraska ' •

. . BUREAU OF BANKING ■...-. • t Lincoln, Nebraska December 1, 1929. Hon. Arthur J. Weaver, Governor, ; Executive Offices, Lincoln. Dear Sir: . . We submit herewith for your, consideration a report embracing statistical and other information taken from the records of this De - partment, concerning 1 the State Banks, Building and Loan Associations and Trust Companies of Nebraska, covering the period from 1890 to June 29, 1929. ' We also include detailed copies of Statements of State Banks of Nebraska, Building anil Loan Associations and Trust Companies as shown by csill of June 29, 1929. .'■••• Respectfully submitted, ; DEPARTMENT OF TRADE AND COMMERCE, Clarence G. Bliss, Secretary.
BUREAU OF BANKING - \ CONTENTS • 'Pages. State Banks i_ . 1-3-15 Trust Companies '_■ ; __ 347-36!) Building and Loan Associations . : 371-466

BUREAU OF BANKING Lincoln, Nebraska . . • . November 18, 1929. Hon. C. G. Bliss, Secretary, Department of Trade and Commerce, Lincoln, Nebraska. ' ■ ■ - Dear Sir: . .• * We submit herewith summaries and' condensed reports of the State Banks of Nebraska under the supervision of the Bureau of Banking as of June 29, 1929. . Respectfully submitted, BUREAU OP BANKING Geo. W. Woods, Bank Commissioner. ■■,'■ -'I •■.■■ :• '• ■. ■. ,
